Posts.Content: Hi everyone, I'm new to this and just have a few questions regarding a friend. She has been diognosed with IDC and has braca1 she said she is having a subcontaneous mastectomy and reconstruction with implants, I don't want to ask her questions as she's very upset about it all. Just wondered if anyone could help me understand what this means, and how it works. Thanks for any help
